description.lang: The product is designed to operate with neutral wire control three channel loads individually. Zero-cross detect function to support a large load of less than 800 Watt per channel.Each channel supports associated control another multi-channel endpointto setup multi-control switch.An individual led indicates inclusion/exclusion processing status.Standard 86 size box with 25mm depth of embedded only.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline, assigned to send switch lifeline status to associated devices.
Association Group 2 is assigned to send Basic Set On frame to associated devices corresponding while channel 1 switch turn on.
Association Group 3 is assigned to send Basic Set Off frame to associated devices corresponding while channel 1 switch turn off.
Association Group 4 is assigned to send Basic Set On frame to associated devices corresponding while channel 2 switch turn on.
Association Group 5 is assigned to send Basic Set Off frame to associated devices corresponding while channel 2 switch turn off.
Association Group 6 is assigned to send Basic Set On frame to associated devices corresponding while channel 3 switch turn on.
Association Group 7 is assigned to send Basic Set Off frame to associated devices corresponding while channel 3 switch turn off.
